content: 10/10 would recommend the trip planner tool. Made our group travel so smooth!

Finally conquered Mount Kenya! The view from Point Lenana is unreal 🏔️🇰🇪 #MountKenya
Boating at Lake Naivasha with the hippos and birds. Pure bliss. 🚤🦢
The Samburu people have such vibrant traditions. Felt honored to be part of their dance. 🎶🩰
